page.title: 20The Story of Fry's Well
page.content: A long time ago six Chilcompton men met to discuss the running of the village.There was a farmer, a vicar and four other imporant men.That same year there was a very hot summer and the river ran dry.This caused many problems.Then a young man saw a drip of water near the common ground.He started to dig then placed a half barrel in the hole and this made a watering place.So they called the place after him, John Fry's Well.There are some cottages named after him.The well is still there and still flowing.
